short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to shop secondhand.  Beni finds the best resale alternatives from across the internet in the click of a button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Beni -- a shopping tool that makes secondhand shopping a breeze.

Beni has quickly become shoppers' go-to extension for saving money and buying sustainably.

You don’t need to be a thrift-star to score incredible secondhand savings. Beni does all the digging for you and instantly finds the brands you love for prices you’ll love even more.

HOW IT WORKS

Shop Like Normal
Browse your favorite retail site and find something you want to buy. Don't hold back -- Beni users save an average of 55%!

Let Beni Do The Thrifting
When you're on the product page, Beni will automatically search over 300M resale listings to see if the item you want is available secondhand at a better price.

See Instant Savings
Click the Beni icon to view a curated list of similar items from secondhand sites — no more combing through multiple sites on your own.

Save BIG with Resale
Ready to buy? Just click the Beni deal you like and head straight to the resale site to grab it before it's gone (resale is one-of-one after all!).

Browse, Save and Share
Just window-shopping? No need to open a ton of tabs -- organize your favorite retail and resale finds in collections, so you can return later or share them with friends.

Use Beni Without Downloading
Wanna try Beni before you download? Just add “checkbeni.com/” in front of any product URL, hit enter, and see all the same resale results you would in the extension!
